_sText:
Slightly larger gun game map than my others, teams start in a small enclosed room, whiich is opened by a button.

The team can choose to camp in the spawn area, and shoot through windows, but be aware, the other team can open their room from outside, ambushing the campers. 
In addition, the floor directly beneath the spawn room is breakable, if the other team breaks your floor, you will fall and take damage making you easier targets.
There is an area beneath the main arena.
